Topic.Title: Who wants to do a collab?

Posts.EditableText: I was thinking about making a collab with someone and if it was possible... Any voulenteers? I don't know the topic yet, so you tell me! Cheers!
Posts.HTML:
I was thinking about making a collab with someone and if it was possible... Any voulenteers?

Posts.EditableText: I'm just finishing up my current game, but i'd be down for a collab.
Posts.HTML: I'm just finishing up my current game, but i'd be down for a collab.

Posts.EditableText: Cool What could it be about? I was thinking some sort of murder mistery. Involving a guy with a fedora What do you think?
Posts.HTML:
Cool
What could it be about? I was thinking some sort of murder mistery. Involving a guy with a fedora

Posts.EditableText: That's actually kinda funny, because the game I'm working on right now is a whodunit murder/mystery game. It's a pretty straightforward solve the murder story, but a lot of the game elements are randomized so the game is different every time you play. It might be kind of fun to do a sleuth style game that has a more engaging story. I've always liked the Tex Murphy series of games and wanted to do something along those lines... Did you have any kind of a story in mind?
Posts.HTML: That's actually kinda funny, because the game I'm working on right now is a whodunit murder/mystery game.
